text: Gordon John Humphrey (born October 9, 1940) is an American politician. He was a member of the U.S. Senate for New Hampshire as a Republican from 1979 to 1990. He twice ran for Governor of New Hampshire, though both bids were unsuccessful. Humphrey was born in Bristol, Connecticut. Humphrey has become a critic of President Donald Trump and as a result of his presidency, he became an Independent.Sinclair, Harriet: "Ex-GOP Senator calls Trump 'sick of mind' and asks Congress to dump him", Newsweek, retrieved August 9, 2017 ==References== ==Other websites== *Election 2002: Sen. title: Gordon J. Humphrey
